about: AI Engineer | Expert in Agentic Systems & Multi-Agent Orchestration Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience at Wipro Limited building scalable backend systems. Specialized in architecting production-grade Agentic Systems using LangGraph to solve LLM reliability challenges. Proven track record of deploying multimodal Llama 3.2 models and implementing rigorous evaluation frameworks to bridge the gap between AI prototypes and enterprise-ready applications. Recipient of the Google India Challenge Scholarship (Top 1%).
